channel.title: lego on Home
channel.description: Recent content in lego on Home

item.title: Building a Lego train
item.description: I actually built this train before when I was in Japan. But today I did it again. It still looks very nice.

item.title: Building a Lego flying car
item.description: Flying car may be a practical vehicle in the future. It can run on the road like other normal cars, can fly like small planes.

item.title: Building a Lego car
item.description: Today, after coming home from school, I made a new Lego car. It looks simple but is really nice.

item.title: Building a Lego vacuuming machine
item.description: A vacuuming machine was not the original idea of this Lego time. Actually, I was trying to build a new Lego car, but it turned out to be a vacuuming machine perfectly. I really love it.

item.title: My dedicated Lego storage
item.description: Happy to share that finally I have a new storage for my Lego pieces. It looks so nice and it is really useful to help me arrange all my Lego parts. Happy Lego-ing!

item.title: Building up my Lego city
item.description: Finally, it is possible to combine everything into a miniature city.

item.title: Building a Lego monorail
item.description: Any child born in Japan loves trains. I am no exception. I love all kinds of train and monorail definitely on the top.

item.title: Building a Lego suspended monorail
item.description: Today, another kind of monorail: a suspended monorail.

item.title: Hunting Lego pieces
item.description: My family, we were going to hunt beautiful Lego pieces at a local store.

item.title: Building a Lego robot
item.description: Built a robot with Lego. It can run, turn around, talk, and be controlled via an iPad. In the below video, you can see that it can also find and shoot a target.

item.title: Building a Lego cat
item.description: Today, I built a new Lego cat. I can use an iPad to connect and control it. As you can see in the below video, the cat can play sounds when I put things near its mouth.
